BR_text.BRsummary: please add .strip() to remove trailing new lines caused by data preparation. All the images go to corrupted count due to this
BR_text.BRdescription:

       in

  l = np.array([x.split() for x in f.read().splitlines()], dtype=np.float32)  # labels

comments_0.comment_text:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/azhar-autocanvas>@azhar-autocanvas</denchmark-link>
 , thank you for your interest in  YOLOv5! Please visit our  <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki#tutorials>Tutorials</denchmark-link>
  to get started, where you can find quickstart guides for simple tasks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Data Training</denchmark-link>
  all the way to advanced concepts like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/issues/607>Hyperparameter Evolution</denchmark-link>
 .
 If this is a 🐛 Bug Report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
 If this is a custom training  Question, please provide as much information as possible, including dataset images, training logs, screenshots, and a public link to online <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data#visualize>W&B logging</denchmark-link>
  if available.
 For business inquiries or professional support requests please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link>
  or email Glenn Jocher at <denchmark-link:mailto:glenn.jocher@ultralytics.com>glenn.jocher@ultralytics.com</denchmark-link>
 .
 <denchmark-h:h2>Requirements</denchmark-h>
 
 Python 3.8 or later with all <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/requirements.txt>requirements.txt</denchmark-link>
  dependencies installed, including . To install run:
 $ pip install -r requirements.txt
 <denchmark-h:h2>Environments</denchmark-h>
 
 YOLOv5 may be run in any of the following up-to-date verified environments (with all dependencies including <denchmark-link:https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda>CUDA</denchmark-link>
 /<denchmark-link:https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn>CUDNN</denchmark-link>
 , <denchmark-link:https://www.python.org/>Python</denchmark-link>
  and <denchmark-link:https://pytorch.org/>PyTorch</denchmark-link>
  preinstalled):
 
 Google Colab Notebook with free GPU: 
 Kaggle Notebook with free GPU: https://www.kaggle.com/ultralytics/yolov5
 Google Cloud Deep Learning VM. See GCP Quickstart Guide
 Docker Image https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov5. See Docker Quickstart Guide 
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Status</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/workflows/CI%20CPU%20testing/badge.svg></denchmark-link>
 
 If this badge is green, all <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/actions>YOLOv5 GitHub Actions</denchmark-link>
  Continuous Integration (CI) tests are currently passing. CI tests verify correct operation of YOLOv5 training (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/train.py>train.py</denchmark-link>
 ), testing (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/test.py>test.py</denchmark-link>
 ), inference (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/detect.py>detect.py</denchmark-link>
 ) and export (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/models/export.py>export.py</denchmark-link>
 ) on MacOS, Windows, and Ubuntu every 24 hours and on every commit.
